page.title: 17Yesterday's Meals.
page.content: For breakfast I had Cocoa Pops with milk, and a glass of milk. During the morning at school I had a small bottle of milk. At dinnertime I went home and had spaghetti and mince, with water to drink. For tea in the evening I had boiled potatoes, beef and peas, and milk to drink. Sometimes I have bubble gum and a chocolate bar. For supper I have crisps and a drink of milk. {*******} I got up at 8 o'clock and went downstairs. I had a Weetabix with jam and milk on it. Just before playtime at school we had a bottle of milk. For school dinner we had creamed potatoes, sweet corn, boiled cabbage and roast mutton. We all had a drink of water on the table. Then we had pineapple shortcake. When I got home I had an apple and a packet of crinkled crisps. Later on I had some salad.
